titles.title: To prohibit the construction of any new Federal building in the District of Columbia.
SWAMP Act
Stop Wasting All our Money on Palaces Act
SWAMP Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary:
Stop Wasting All our Money on Palaces Act or the SWAMP Act
This bill prohibits the construction by the General Services Administration or any other federal department or agency of a new federal building in the District of Columbia for a two-year period beginning on the date of this bill's enactment.
